abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, will return to view a wooden sculpture of Buddhist deity Guanyin after 17 years of treatment and analysis; McMullen Museum of Art at Boston College presents group exhibit The Arts and Crafts Movement: Making It Irish; Museum of the American Arts and Crafts Movement reveals future display of collection from Two Red Roses Foundation before museum's official opening in Florida in 2018.

headline.main: A Buddhist Deity Returns to Boston

keywords.value: Museum of the American Arts and Crafts Movement
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: The Arts and Crafts Movement: Making It Irish (Exhibit)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: A statue of Guanyin will go back on view at the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, on Feb. 6.
lead_paragraph: A statue of Guanyin will go back on view at the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, on Feb. 6.
